column4: is there any image loader server like Northon Ghost that I can use on ubuntu to load image to remote computers?
When having an Ubuntu image, you can work with whatever tool you want.
thanks
Partimage, clonezilla, dd
Which error exactly?
Thats an error occuring when the monitor connected isnt capable of the graphics mode you wanted. Thats all.
It doesnt stop Ubuntu from booting, loading, starting or functioning.
is it about BIOS or ubuntu?
No.
It's about the monitor not being capable of the desired graphics mode.
How do you see that error without a monitor connected?
Unless you have a bios to power it on at a give point in time, you cannot do so with ubuntu. Just put your finger on the power button to power it on.
is it possible if ubuntu sleeps rather than shutdown? In this case, is it possible to schedule wake up and sleep times?
No.
You can schedule the shutdown, but why dont you just shut it down when finished? Instead of loosing work, when trying to write the last sentence of a letter?
I would like to implement wakeup and sleep schedule for an embedded board, and it will work remotely. I just wondered if there is any command to schedule a linux's working hours
The answer still is "No".
No.
You cant use scp over a serial connection, unless you set up something like the already mentioned SLIP, or similar.
It doesnt have other compilers unless you installed some, which you would know of.
thanks, I am using a ubuntu image, is there any command to see the existing compilers?
